00016 #define MAVEN_OS
00017 
00018 
00019 // choose operating system
00020 #ifdef _WIN32
00021         #undef MAVEN_OS
00022         #define MAVEN_OS 2
00023 #elif __GNUC__
00024         #undef MAVEN_OS
00025         #define MAVEN_OS 1
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 
00029 // system commands
00030 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00031 
00032         #define SYSTEM_RM "rm -f "
00033         #define SYSTEM_CP "cp -f "
00034         #define SYSTEM_MKDIR "mkdir "
00035 
00036 #elif MAVEN_OS == 2
00037 
00038         #define SYSTEM_RM "del -f "
00039         #define SYSTEM_CP "copy -y "
00040         #define SYSTEM_MKDIR "mkdir "
00041 
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #endif
